attributes.action: make the Energy Performance Certificate graph a mandatory requirement to be published in the sales materials that relate to the property being offered for Sale/Let/Lease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present for Commercial property it is the owner who is responsible for the obtaining the Non-Domestic Energy Performance Certificate. This petition woud not change that but would require Commercial Estate agents to publish the EPC graph/details in any related sales material.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to make the Energy Performance Certificate graph a mandatory requirement to be published in the sales materials that relate to the property being offered for Sale/Let/Lease.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=CommercialEPC


Her Majesty's Government
